Room.Name: Ranger Training Location
Room.ShortDescription: You are in one of the many training locations within the Riverdell Park.
Room.LongDescription: If you are a level nine tracker or a level ten underhillsman, you may train here to advance to the next level. Once you have reached level eleven, you must track down the next training site. Subsequent training sites will be for a single level only, instead of for two levels, as have all the previous training sites, including this one.
